messages.messageBody:
Contact me offlist.


~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
"There is no single effort more radical in its potential for saving the world than a transformation of the way we raise our children." Marianne Williamson



-----Original Message-----
From: Deb <vwb777@...>
To: unschoolingbasics <unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thu, Nov 10, 2011 9:15 am
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Looking for link to a local group.


[moderator's note: I don't usually send these through, but I can't seem to find
a SC unschooling group (USA) - does anyone have a link to one?]


Just wondering if there are any of you living near Beaufort county. We are the
lone unschoolers here as far as I know and we'd love to meet some others.
Thanks.



------------------------------------
